name: google-cloud-translate
label: Google Cloud Translate
description: Google Cloud translation technology to instantly translate texts into more than one hundred languages

fields.title: Service Account Private Key
fields.tooltip: Service Account Private Key file contents
fields.description: Service Account Private Key file contents
fields.name: service_account_data

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Translate Text
operations.description: Translates input text based on input parameters and returns translated text.

parameters.title: Input Text
parameters.description: The input text to translate. Provide an array of strings to translate multiple phrases. The maximum number of strings is 128.
parameters.tooltip: The input text to translate. Provide an array of strings to translate multiple phrases. The maximum number of strings is 128.
parameters.name: input_text

parameters.title: Target
parameters.description: The language to use for translation of the input text
parameters.tooltip: The language to use for translation of the input text
parameters.name: target

parameters.title: Format
parameters.description: The format of the source text, in either HTML (default) or plain-text.
parameters.tooltip: The format of the source text, in either HTML (default) or plain-text.
parameters.name: format

parameters.title: Source
parameters.description: The language of the source text, set to one of the language codes listed in Language Support. If the source language is not specified, the API will attempt to detect the source language automatically and return it within the response.
parameters.tooltip: The language of the source text, set to one of the language codes listed in Language Support. If the source language is not specified, the API will attempt to detect the source language automatically and return it within the response.
parameters.name: source

parameters.title: Model
parameters.description: The translation model. Cloud Translation - Basic offers only the nmt Neural Machine Translation (NMT) model.If the model is base, the request is translated by using the NMT model
parameters.tooltip: The translation model. Cloud Translation - Basic offers only the nmt Neural Machine Translation (NMT) model.If the model is base, the request is translated by using the NMT model
parameters.name: model

operations.title: Get Languages
operations.description: Returns a list of supported languages for translation.
